## Form.link() method

Link 2 blocks (master detail) on specified keys. If not orphan, the child block will not be part of QBE

**Signature:**

```typescript
link(master: Key, detail: Key, orphanQueries?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  master | [Key](./forms42core.key.md) | The key for the master block. |
|  detail | [Key](./forms42core.key.md) | The key for the detail block. |
|  orphanQueries | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, orphan queries will be set (optional). |

**Returns:**

void
